languages.text: {n}Мужчина злобно ощеривается.{/n} "Да ну? Знаем мы вашу доброту — ядом напичкаете нас и подыхать бросите. Чтобы мы ваш корабль не марали".
{n}The man bares his teeth malevolently.{/n} "Will you now? We know your kindness — you'll douse us with poison and leave us to die. So we don't sully your ship."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина злобно ощеривается.{/n} "Да ну? Знаем мы вашу доброту — ядом напичкаете нас и подыхать бросите. Чтобы мы ваш корабль не марали".

{n}The man bares his teeth malevolently.{/n} "Will you now? We know your kindness — you'll douse us with poison and leave us to die. So we don't sully your ship."
{n}The man bares his teeth malevolently.{/n} "Will you now? We know your kindness — you'll douse us with poison and leave us to die. So we don't sully your ship."
{n}The man bares his teeth malevolently.{/n} "Will you now? We know your kindness — you'll douse us with poison and leave us to die. So we don't sully your ship."
{n}The man bares his teeth malevolently.{/n} "Will you now? We know your kindness — you'll douse us with poison and leave us to die. So we don't sully your ship."

languages.text: {n}El hombre te enseña los dientes con expresión maliciosa.{/n} «¿No me diga? Conocemos de sobra su generosidad: nos rociará con veneno y nos abandonará a nuestra suerte. Para que no le ensuciemos la nave».
languages.original_text: {n}The man bares his teeth malevolently.{/n} "Will you now? We know your kindness — you'll douse us with poison and leave us to die. So we don't sully your ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre te enseña los dientes con expresión maliciosa.{/n} «¿No me diga? Conocemos de sobra su generosidad: nos rociará con veneno y nos abandonará a nuestra suerte. Para que no le ensuciemos la nave».

languages.text: {n}男は不敵に歯をむき出しにする。{/n}「そうだろう？毒を盛られ、見殺しにされるのがオチだ。だから、私たちはあなたの船を汚さない」
languages.original_text: {n}The man bares his teeth malevolently.{/n} "Will you now? We know your kindness — you'll douse us with poison and leave us to die. So we don't sully your ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}男は不敵に歯をむき出しにする。{/n}「そうだろう？毒を盛られ、見殺しにされるのがオチだ。だから、私たちはあなたの船を汚さない」

languages.text: {n}这个人充满恶意地露出了牙齿。{/n}“噢，是吗？我们可太清楚你的好意了。你打算给我们吃有毒的东西，让我们自生自灭，这样我们就不会弄脏你的船了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The man bares his teeth malevolently.{/n} "Will you now? We know your kindness — you'll douse us with poison and leave us to die. So we don't sully your ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个人充满恶意地露出了牙齿。{/n}“噢，是吗？我们可太清楚你的好意了。你打算给我们吃有毒的东西，让我们自生自灭，这样我们就不会弄脏你的船了。”

languages.text: {n}Der Mann entblößt seine Zähne zu einem bösartigen Lächeln.{/n} "Ach, tatsächlich? Wir kennen Eure Barmherzigkeit ... Ihr betäubt uns mit Gift und lasst uns verrecken. Damit wir Euer Schiff nicht besudeln."
languages.original_text: {n}The man bares his teeth malevolently.{/n} "Will you now? We know your kindness — you'll douse us with poison and leave us to die. So we don't sully your ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann entblößt seine Zähne zu einem bösartigen Lächeln.{/n} "Ach, tatsächlich? Wir kennen Eure Barmherzigkeit ... Ihr betäubt uns mit Gift und lasst uns verrecken. Damit wir Euer Schiff nicht besudeln."

languages.text: {n}L'homme montre les dents d'un air malveillant.{/n} « Allons bon... On la connaît, votre générosité. Vous allez nous asperger de poison avant de nous laisser crever. Tout ça parce que vous avez peur qu'on salisse votre précieux vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: {n}The man bares his teeth malevolently.{/n} "Will you now? We know your kindness — you'll douse us with poison and leave us to die. So we don't sully your ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme montre les dents d'un air malveillant.{/n} « Allons bon... On la connaît, votre générosité. Vous allez nous asperger de poison avant de nous laisser crever. Tout ça parce que vous avez peur qu'on salisse votre précieux vaisseau. »

languages.text: {n}Adam sinsice dişlerini sıkıyor.{/n} "Öyle mi yapacaksın? Senin gibilerin nezaketini biliriz biz. Bize zehir aşılayıp hepimizi ölüme terk edeceksin ki gemini kirletmeyelim."
languages.original_text: {n}The man bares his teeth malevolently.{/n} "Will you now? We know your kindness — you'll douse us with poison and leave us to die. So we don't sully your ship."
